snippet.title: Wavelength division multiplexing : a practical engineering guide
snippet.description: Wavelength division multiplexing : a practical engineering guide / Grobe, Klaus In this book, Optical Wavelength Division Multiplexing (WDM) is approached from a strictly practical and application-oriented point of view [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2013. - 430 p.

snippet.title: Convergence of wireless, wireline, and photonics next generation networks
snippet.description: Convergence of wireless, wireline, and photonics next generation networks / Iniewski, Krzysztof Filled with illustrations and practical examples from industry, this book provides a brief but comprehensive introduction to the next-generation wireless networks that will soon replace more traditional wired technologies [...] Hoboken, NJ : John Wiley & Sons, 2010. - 806 p.
